AI Description: PyCharm is an Integrated Development Environment (IDE) used for programming in Python. It provides a range of tools for Python development, such as code completion, code inspection, a debugger, version control system integration, and support for web development with Django and Data Science with Anaconda.
Core Features: Intelligent Code Editor, Graphical Debugger & Test Runner, Integrated Unit Testing, Built-In Terminal, Code Refactoring, Version Control Integration
